description: Docusaurus is a documentation site generator built by Facebook. It uses React, Markdown, and a plugin system to create optimized, SEO-friendly documentation sites with versioning, search, and i18n support. Popular among open-source and enterprise projects, Docusaurus simplifies technical writing with built-in theming and deployment.

name: next-mdx-remote
description: next-mdx-remote is a package that allows you to render MDX content from remote sources in Next.js applications. It provides flexibility to handle dynamic content like blog posts or documentation pages from headless CMSs or APIs. Great for combining Markdown content with interactive components in server-rendered or static pages.

name: Plasmic
description: Plasmic is a visual builder for React and headless CMSs that enables developers and designers to collaborate on frontend UIs. It supports full-code export, integrations with Next.js, Gatsby, and Remix, and delivers production-grade components that are themeable and performant. Used to accelerate web app and landing page development.

name: MDX Deck
description: MDX Deck is a presentation tool built with MDX and React. It allows developers to write slide decks using Markdown and embed React components for interactivity. It's ideal for tech talks, documentation-based demos, and developer presentations, offering themes, transitions, and export options.

name: Nano JSX
description: Nano JSX is a 1KB React-like library for building UI components with JSX. It is optimized for speed, minimalism, and modern JavaScript environments such as Deno, Bun, and Node.js. Nano JSX supports server-side rendering (SSR) and is ideal for edge computing and ultra-lightweight frontend applications.

name: ReflexJS
description: ReflexJS is a modern React-based framework focused on building performant websites with styled-components and MDX. It comes with a built-in design system, page builder support, and integrations for CMSs and eCommerce platforms. Ideal for startups building fast, customizable marketing and documentation websites.

name: VitePress
description: VitePress is a static site generator powered by Vite and Vue. It offers lightning-fast hot module replacement and minimal configuration for building documentation websites. VitePress supports Markdown with Vue components, custom theming, and deploys easily on platforms like GitHub Pages and Netlify.

name: Eleventy
description: Eleventy (11ty) is a simple and flexible static site generator that transforms Markdown, HTML, and templates into fast websites. It supports multiple template languages like Nunjucks, Liquid, and Handlebars, and is known for its speed and zero-config philosophy. Ideal for blogs, portfolios, and JAMstack sites.

name: Astro
description: Astro is a modern static site builder designed for performance and flexibility. It enables developers to use multiple frontend frameworks (React, Vue, Svelte, etc.) together in one project. Astro renders components to static HTML by default and loads JavaScript only as needed, delivering optimal performance for modern websites.

name: Gridsome
description: Gridsome is a Vue-powered static site generator that uses GraphQL for data sourcing and builds blazing-fast websites. It is ideal for JAMstack development and SEO-optimized sites. Gridsome supports content from Markdown, CMSs, and APIs, and compiles pages with automatic code splitting and progressive images.

name: Docusaurus
description: Docusaurus is a documentation site generator built by Facebook. It uses React, Markdown, and a plugin system to create optimized, SEO-friendly documentation sites with versioning, search, and i18n support. Popular among open-source and enterprise projects, Docusaurus simplifies technical writing with built-in theming and deployment.

name: next-mdx-remote
description: next-mdx-remote is a package that allows you to render MDX content from remote sources in Next.js applications. It provides flexibility to handle dynamic content like blog posts or documentation pages from headless CMSs or APIs. Great for combining Markdown content with interactive components in server-rendered or static pages.

name: Plasmic
description: Plasmic is a visual builder for React and headless CMSs that enables developers and designers to collaborate on frontend UIs. It supports full-code export, integrations with Next.js, Gatsby, and Remix, and delivers production-grade components that are themeable and performant. Used to accelerate web app and landing page development.

name: MDX Deck
description: MDX Deck is a presentation tool built with MDX and React. It allows developers to write slide decks using Markdown and embed React components for interactivity. It's ideal for tech talks, documentation-based demos, and developer presentations, offering themes, transitions, and export options.

name: Vanilla Extract
description: Vanilla Extract is a zero-runtime CSS-in-TypeScript framework. It allows you to write type-safe styles with full theme support, scoped class generation, and framework-agnostic output. Designed for scalability, it's ideal for teams using TypeScript to build large, maintainable design systems.

name: Stitches
description: Stitches is a modern CSS-in-JS library focused on performance and developer ergonomics. It features zero-runtime, atomic CSS output, theming, variants, and server-side rendering support. Stitches integrates easily with React and TypeScript and is well-suited for design systems and component libraries.

name: Emotion
description: Emotion is a powerful and flexible CSS-in-JS library that allows developers to style components using JavaScript or TypeScript. It supports both styled components and the `css` prop, offering full control over styles, theming, and class composition. Emotion works well in both server and client environments.

name: Jotai
description: Jotai is a minimalistic atomic state management library for React. It provides a simple, scalable, and primitive-based API for managing application state without boilerplate. Jotai supports derived atoms, async atoms, and React Suspense integration, making it perfect for modern, lightweight React apps.

name: Valtio
description: Valtio is a proxy-based state management library for React that allows direct mutation of state. It uses JavaScript proxies to track changes and trigger re-renders with minimal effort. Valtio supports derived values, snapshots, and works with concurrent rendering in React 18.

name: Zustand
description: Zustand is a fast and simple state management library built by the creators of Jotai and React Spring. It features a minimal API, built-in persistence, and no boilerplate. Zustand is ideal for managing global or local component state in scalable React applications without using context or reducers.

name: Effector
description: Effector is a powerful and reactive state manager for building predictable applications. It supports TypeScript out of the box, has first-class stores, and features a declarative API for complex state interactions. Effector is framework-agnostic and supports both React and Vanilla JS environments.

name: XState
description: XState is a state machine and statechart library for JavaScript and TypeScript applications. It models complex UI logic using finite state machines and hierarchical statecharts, which provide predictability and maintainability. XState works across frontend frameworks and integrates well with React, Vue, and Svelte.

name: Nano Stores
description: Nano Stores is a tiny state manager for React, Preact, and Vanilla JS applications. It offers atomic state structures with efficient updates and low memory footprint. With support for persistent storage, lazy loading, and TypeScript, Nano Stores is ideal for modern SPAs that require performance and modularity.

name: Storeon
description: Storeon is a tiny event-based state manager with a size of only 173 bytes. It is framework-agnostic and supports Redux-like patterns without the boilerplate. Storeon includes plugins for persistence, routing, and logging, and is ideal for small apps or projects where simplicity and performance are critical.

name: React Query
description: React Query is a data-fetching and state management library for React that simplifies handling remote data. It provides powerful caching, synchronization, pagination, and background updating capabilities. React Query is ideal for frontend apps that depend heavily on server data and asynchronous operations.

name: SWR
description: SWR (Stale-While-Revalidate) is a React data-fetching library developed by Vercel. It focuses on simplicity and speed, using caching and revalidation strategies to keep UI in sync with server state. SWR is ideal for stateless frontend applications and integrates seamlessly with Next.js.

name: Axios
description: Axios is a popular promise-based HTTP client for the browser and Node.js. It simplifies making HTTP requests and handling responses, with support for interceptors, cancellation, and automatic JSON parsing. Axios is widely used in frontend frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular for API communication.

name: Ky
description: Ky is a tiny and elegant HTTP client built on top of the native Fetch API. It provides a simpler API, auto retries, timeout support, and JSON handling out of the box. Ky is ideal for frontend projects where size and simplicity matter, offering a modern alternative to Axios.

name: React Hook Form
description: React Hook Form is a performant form validation library for React. It reduces re-renders, integrates with UI libraries, and supports schema validation with libraries like Yup and Zod. Designed with simplicity and performance in mind, it's widely adopted for building scalable, accessible forms.

name: Formik
description: Formik is a form library for React that helps with managing form state, validation, and submission. It supports integration with Yup for schema validation and works well with controlled and uncontrolled form components. Formik is ideal for building robust, large-scale forms in enterprise applications.

name: Yup
description: Yup is a JavaScript schema builder for value parsing and validation. It is commonly used with React forms and libraries like Formik and React Hook Form. Yup allows defining complex validation rules with a fluent API and supports asynchronous and conditional logic.

name: Zod
description: Zod is a TypeScript-first schema declaration and validation library. It provides a declarative and immutable API, with strong TypeScript inference. Zod is ideal for form validation, API input parsing, and type-safe data handling across frontend and backend codebases.

name: React Final Form
description: React Final Form is a form state management library for React. Built on top of Final Form, it provides performance-optimized form handling and declarative APIs. It supports subscription-based rendering, validation, and field-level customization, making it a great choice for complex form flows.

name: VeeValidate
description: VeeValidate is a form validation framework for Vue.js. It offers flexible validation rules, schema-based validation with Yup or Zod, and integration with Vue’s composition API. VeeValidate supports custom components and internationalization, making it a robust solution for Vue form validation.

name: Vuelidate
description: Vuelidate is a model-based validation library for Vue.js. It provides reactive validation logic with minimal boilerplate and supports both synchronous and asynchronous rules. Vuelidate integrates well with Vue 2 and Vue 3 and is a preferred choice for developers who want simple, maintainable form validation.

name: VueUse
description: VueUse is a collection of essential Vue 3 composition utilities. It provides over 200 composables covering browser APIs, reactivity, sensors, and animation. VueUse improves productivity and consistency in Vue projects and integrates smoothly with Nuxt and Vite ecosystems.

name: Pinia
description: Pinia is the official state management library for Vue 3. It replaces Vuex with a simpler API, full TypeScript support, and devtools integration. Pinia supports multiple stores, modular design, and SSR, making it suitable for both small and large-scale applications.

name: Naive UI
description: Naive UI is a fully customizable, Vue 3 component library with a modern aesthetic. It supports dark mode, SSR, TypeScript, and internationalization out of the box. Naive UI offers a full suite of form controls, layouts, charts, and admin dashboard components, making it ideal for modern web apps.

name: PrimeVue
description: PrimeVue is a comprehensive UI component library for Vue.js, offering over 90 components including data tables, forms, overlays, and charts. It supports accessibility, theming, and integration with form libraries like VeeValidate. Ideal for enterprise-level applications with complex UI needs.

name: Element Plus
description: Element Plus is a Vue 3-based component library that continues the popular Element UI framework. It features elegant, well-documented components like buttons, modals, date pickers, and form inputs. Built with TypeScript and Sass, it’s optimized for modern apps and design systems.

name: Quasar Framework
description: Quasar is a Vue-based frontend framework for building responsive SPAs, PWAs, SSR apps, mobile apps (via Cordova or Capacitor), and Electron desktop apps. It includes a complete set of UI components, CLI tooling, and performance optimization features, making it a full-stack solution for Vue developers.

name: Vuetify
description: Vuetify is a popular Material Design component framework for Vue.js. It provides a comprehensive set of responsive and accessible UI components built to align with Google’s Material Design specs. Vuetify supports Vue 2 and Vue 3 and integrates with Vue CLI, Nuxt, and Vite.

name: Vue Material
description: Vue Material is a lightweight UI framework that brings Google Material Design components to Vue 2 projects. It provides easy-to-use and responsive UI elements like buttons, inputs, cards, and navigation drawers. Vue Material is ideal for small-to-medium Vue applications that require material styling with minimal dependencies.

name: Buefy
description: Buefy is a lightweight UI library for Vue.js based on Bulma CSS framework. It combines Bulma’s responsive design philosophy with Vue components, offering simplicity, flexibility, and a small footprint. Buefy is great for quick UI development using familiar HTML-like classes and Vue bindings.

name: Inkline
description: Inkline is a modern, customizable UI/UX component framework for Vue.js. Built with accessibility in mind, it includes responsive grid systems, form controls, modals, tabs, and notifications. Inkline uses Sass and offers dark mode, internationalization, and excellent TypeScript support out of the box.

name: Oruga UI
description: Oruga UI is a lightweight, themeable UI component library for Vue.js that focuses on flexibility and minimalism. It’s framework-agnostic, integrates seamlessly with CSS frameworks like Bulma or Tailwind, and allows you to fully customize components without being tied to a design system.

name: Vue Treeselect
description: Vue Treeselect is a powerful multi-select component for Vue.js featuring a hierarchical tree UI. It supports async options loading, filtering, and tagging, and is optimized for performance with large datasets. Ideal for forms that require nested or grouped selections.

name: Vue Multiselect
description: Vue Multiselect is a flexible multi-select dropdown component for Vue.js with tagging, searching, and async options support. It’s ideal for highly customizable input forms and supports single or multi-select, custom templates, and remote data binding.

name: V-Calendar
description: V-Calendar is a highly customizable date picker and calendar component for Vue.js. It supports single, range, and multiple date selection, along with localization, accessibility, and dark mode. Useful for forms, bookings, and scheduling interfaces in Vue applications.

name: Vue Notification
description: Vue Notification is a lightweight toast notification plugin for Vue.js with configurable options for positioning, timing, styling, and actions. It integrates easily into Vue apps and provides a clean API for showing user feedback and alerts.

name: Vue Toastification
description: Vue Toastification is a sleek, customizable toast notification library for Vue 2 and 3. It supports auto-dismiss, transitions, click-to-close, and dynamic updates. Built with accessibility and performance in mind, it’s perfect for clean alert systems in modern Vue apps.

name: Vue Chart.js
description: Vue Chart.js is a wrapper around the Chart.js library for Vue 2 and Vue 3. It simplifies chart integration by offering reactive and declarative components for bar, line, pie, radar, and doughnut charts. Ideal for dashboards, analytics, and real-time visualizations.

name: Vue ECharts
description: Vue ECharts is an elegant wrapper for Apache ECharts, enabling reactive charts and rich data visualizations in Vue applications. It supports dynamic datasets, responsive resizing, and deep customization of options, making it a go-to tool for dashboards and complex analytics.

name: Vue Grid Layout
description: Vue Grid Layout is a responsive, draggable, and resizable grid layout system inspired by React-Grid-Layout. It’s ideal for building customizable dashboards, Kanban boards, and widget panels. Supports drag handles, layout persistence, and breakpoint-based layouts.

name: Vue Draggable Next
description: Vue Draggable Next is a Vue 3-compatible wrapper around the popular SortableJS library. It provides drag-and-drop functionality for lists and grids with full support for touch, animations, and custom drag handles. Ideal for sortable lists, Kanban boards, and dynamic layouts in Vue apps.

name: Vue Slick Carousel
description: Vue Slick Carousel is a Vue wrapper for the Slick carousel library, offering responsive, touch-enabled sliders. It supports lazy loading, autoplay, variable width, and custom arrows. Great for media galleries, product showcases, or interactive carousels in Vue applications.

name: Keen Slider
description: Keen Slider is a lightweight touch slider library with native performance and zero dependencies. It supports carousels, galleries, and multi-slider setups with flexible configuration. Keen Slider works with any frontend framework including Vue, React, and plain JavaScript.

name: Glide.js
description: Glide.js is a dependency-free JavaScript ES6 slider and carousel library. It features smooth transitions, responsive design, and touch support. Glide is ideal for lightweight web apps, landing pages, and mobile-friendly image galleries.

name: Vue Awesome Swiper
description: Vue Awesome Swiper integrates the Swiper slider library with Vue.js, offering powerful features like nested slides, mouse wheel control, 3D effects, and pagination. It's ideal for image sliders, product showcases, and swipe-based interactions in Vue apps.

name: Swiper
description: Swiper is a modern mobile touch slider with hardware-accelerated transitions, rich features, and zero dependencies. It supports vertical and horizontal modes, nested slides, autoplay, parallax, and 3D effects. It's framework-agnostic and widely used in mobile-first UIs and progressive web apps.

name: Splide
description: Splide is a lightweight, extensible, and responsive slider written in pure JavaScript. It offers extensive customization, lazy loading, multiple breakpoints, and accessibility out of the box. Splide works with any frontend framework and is excellent for high-performance sliders and galleries.

name: Vue Carousel
description: Vue Carousel is a responsive, touch-friendly carousel component for Vue 2. It includes features such as infinite scrolling, autoplay, pagination, and mobile swipe gestures. Ideal for simple image or content carousels with minimal setup and high customizability.

name: Vue Cool Lightbox
description: Vue Cool Lightbox is a modern lightbox gallery plugin for Vue.js. It supports responsive image and video displays, keyboard navigation, zoom, and custom UI slots. Designed for media-rich applications like portfolios, product pages, and blogs.

name: LightGallery
description: LightGallery is a highly customizable and full-featured lightbox gallery plugin written in vanilla JavaScript. It supports images, videos, iframes, autoplay, zoom, and fullscreen. With its plugin system, developers can extend and style it easily across any frontend stack.

name: BaguetteBox.js
description: BaguetteBox.js is a simple and lightweight JavaScript lightbox library for images. It offers responsive design, keyboard navigation, touch support, and lazy loading. It requires zero dependencies and is great for quick implementation of mobile-ready photo galleries.

name: Fancybox
description: Fancybox is a professional JavaScript lightbox library for displaying images, HTML, and videos. It supports touch, drag, zoom, slideshow, and fullscreen modes. Fancybox is well-suited for premium web apps, portfolios, and e-commerce sites needing advanced media presentation.

name: PhotoSwipe
description: PhotoSwipe is a JavaScript gallery library for mobile and desktop with native-like gesture support. It features zooming, pinch, swiping, fullscreen, and caption support. Used in major image-heavy websites, it emphasizes performance, touch accuracy, and ease of integration.

name: Justified Gallery
description: Justified Gallery is a jQuery-based image gallery plugin that creates justified, Flickr-style layouts. It balances rows dynamically and supports lightbox integrations for high-quality photo displays. Best suited for portfolio pages and professional image showcases.

name: Vue Gallery
description: Vue Gallery is a responsive and minimalist gallery component for Vue 2 apps. It supports swipe gestures, zooming, lazy loading, and customizable transitions. Built for simplicity, it's ideal for image portfolios and blogs using Vue.

name: Vue Picture Swipe
description: Vue Picture Swipe is a Vue wrapper for PhotoSwipe, offering a mobile-friendly image gallery with pinch-to-zoom and swipe navigation. It allows declarative syntax and integrates seamlessly with Vue 2. Great for full-screen gallery views with performance in mind.

name: Vue Masonry CSS
description: Vue Masonry CSS is a lightweight masonry layout library for Vue.js that relies on pure CSS columns. It avoids JavaScript layout calculations for better performance and responsiveness. Ideal for image-heavy layouts, grids, and Pinterest-style designs.

name: Macy.js
description: Macy.js is a tiny layout library for building responsive, grid-based, and masonry-style layouts. It supports column-based layouts, image preloading, and breakpoints. Macy is framework-agnostic and ideal for creating Pinterest-style UIs without relying on large dependencies.

name: Vue Waterfall
description: Vue Waterfall is a Vue.js component for creating waterfall layouts (masonry-like) optimized for image-heavy sites. It supports infinite scroll, lazy loading, and responsive column widths. Ideal for building Pinterest-style galleries or portfolios in Vue applications.

name: Bricklayer
description: Bricklayer is a lightweight masonry-style layout library written in pure JavaScript. It dynamically arranges elements into balanced columns and works well with responsive and lazy-loaded content. Bricklayer is framework-agnostic and great for blogs, portfolios, and card UIs.

name: Muuri
description: Muuri is a responsive, sortable, and filterable layout engine for web apps. It combines the features of Packery, Masonry, and Sortable into one customizable grid system. With drag-and-drop and dynamic filtering, Muuri is ideal for dashboards, visual organizers, and media galleries.

name: Isotope
description: Isotope is a powerful layout and filtering library that supports masonry, fitRows, and other dynamic layouts. It allows sorting, filtering, and real-time DOM manipulation for creating interactive galleries and portfolios. Available under commercial license with robust documentation.

name: Packery
description: Packery is a JavaScript layout engine that creates cascading grid layouts with draggable support. It fills gaps intelligently and supports touch and mouse drag-and-drop. Frequently used in dashboard and CMS interfaces, Packery makes responsive UIs easy to manage.

name: React Beautiful DnD
description: React Beautiful DnD is a popular drag-and-drop library by Atlassian. It provides natural movement, keyboard support, and reordering for lists and grids with full a11y compliance. Ideal for Trello-style boards, Kanban workflows, and interactive dashboards.

name: dnd-kit
description: dnd-kit is a modern, extensible drag-and-drop toolkit for React apps. Built with accessibility and modularity in mind, it provides sensor support, drag overlays, sorting primitives, and custom drop logic. It’s a flexible alternative to older drag libraries.

name: React DnD
description: React DnD is a set of React utilities for building complex drag-and-drop interfaces. It supports multi-backend setups, nested dragging, and preview customization. Backed by HTML5 DnD APIs, it’s a robust solution for sortable lists and modular UIs.

name: SortableJS
description: SortableJS is a minimal, dependency-free JavaScript library for reordering lists via drag-and-drop. It supports touch events, animation, multi-drag, and swap modes. SortableJS is framework-agnostic and used in complex UI systems like dashboards and CMSs.

name: React Grid Layout
description: React Grid Layout is a draggable and resizable grid layout system built for React. It supports breakpoints, responsive resizing, and layout persistence. Commonly used for dashboards and admin panels where users can customize their layout in real time.

name: Gridstack.js
description: Gridstack.js is a responsive drag-and-drop grid layout system supporting multi-column layouts, resizing, and nesting. Written in TypeScript, it integrates with frameworks like Angular, React, and Vue and is often used for data dashboards and content editors.

name: Gridlex
description: Gridlex is a flexbox-based grid system that enables rapid responsive layouts with minimal classes. It simplifies column alignment, spacing, and ordering with mobile-first principles. Useful for lightweight landing pages and apps that don’t require complex grid logic.

name: Reflexbox
description: Reflexbox is a responsive grid and layout utility built with Styled System and React. It offers flexbox utilities with responsive props and integrates seamlessly with theme-based design systems. Best for rapid layout prototyping in React apps.

name: Vue Flexboxgrid
description: Vue Flexboxgrid is a Vue wrapper for the popular Flexbox Grid CSS framework. It allows developers to use familiar grid layout syntax with Vue components. Ideal for quickly building responsive layouts in Vue 2 projects.

name: Vue Layout System
description: Vue Layout System is a Vue 3 utility-first layout engine that enables custom, responsive section building. It supports grid rows, columns, spacing, and media breakpoints. Perfect for developing sectioned layouts for CMSs or page builders.

name: Tailblocks
description: Tailblocks is a collection of ready-to-use Tailwind CSS UI components and landing page sections. It includes headers, features, pricing tables, footers, and more. Developers can copy and paste blocks into Tailwind projects to rapidly prototype websites.

name: Vue Tailwind
description: Vue Tailwind is a set of fully customizable Vue.js components styled with Tailwind CSS. It includes inputs, buttons, selects, and modals that adapt to your design system. Components are themeable and work with Vue 2 and 3.

name: Headless UI
description: Headless UI is a library of completely unstyled, fully accessible UI components designed to integrate with Tailwind CSS. Created by the Tailwind Labs team, it includes dialogs, menus, popovers, and tabs that offer complete control over styling and structure.

name: Tailwind Elements
description: Tailwind Elements is a large set of UI components built with Tailwind CSS and based on Material Design. It includes over 500 components like modals, carousels, forms, and tables, with ready-to-use examples and theme customization options. It’s ideal for building sleek, modern UIs using Tailwind.

name: TW Elements
description: TW Elements is a collection of over 800 UI components built with Tailwind CSS and inspired by Bootstrap. It offers tabs, cards, accordions, charts, and complete templates. All components are fully responsive and customizable via Tailwind’s utility classes.

name: DaisyUI
description: DaisyUI is a popular Tailwind CSS plugin that adds pre-styled components using Tailwind’s utility classes. It includes buttons, navbars, cards, and alerts, with built-in themes and dark mode support. Ideal for developers who want ready-to-use design without leaving Tailwind's utility-based workflow.

name: Windstrap
description: Windstrap is a utility-first UI kit that merges Tailwind CSS with Bootstrap-like component structures. It includes classes for alerts, forms, tables, modals, and navigation bars, offering a Bootstrap-like syntax but built entirely with Tailwind utilities.

name: Meraki UI
description: Meraki UI is a Tailwind-based UI components library that includes clean and minimal templates for headers, footers, cards, and forms. Designed for minimal setup and fast prototyping, Meraki UI is useful for modern websites and landing pages.

name: Flowbite
description: Flowbite is an open-source UI component library built with Tailwind CSS. It includes hundreds of interactive elements like modals, dropdowns, navbars, and tables powered by Alpine.js. It offers Figma design kits and is often used for SaaS dashboards and admin UIs.

name: Kutty UI
description: Kutty is a Tailwind CSS plugin with accessible and composable components for UI development. It includes alerts, modals, tabs, and form elements that follow accessibility standards and minimal design patterns. Great for developers prioritizing accessibility and simplicity.

name: Tailkit
description: Tailkit is a premium Tailwind UI component kit that includes over 250+ professionally designed components and page examples. It’s built for React and Laravel developers looking for ready-made admin panels, e-commerce templates, and landing pages with Tailwind styling.

name: Tailblocks UI
description: Tailblocks UI offers a drag-and-drop editor for designing web pages using Tailwind CSS blocks. It includes responsive UI sections for hero areas, testimonials, call-to-actions, and more. Useful for designers who want low-code Tailwind page design without writing HTML manually.

name: Blocks UI
description: Blocks UI is a visual editor for React and MDX that helps build UIs using a drag-and-drop canvas. It integrates with Gatsby and Theme UI to produce clean code as output. Great for teams who want to design and code components visually with custom themes.

name: Grommet
description: Grommet is a React-based framework for responsive and accessible web apps. It offers components like grids, buttons, forms, and data visualizations, all with built-in accessibility support. Grommet is widely used in enterprise apps and design systems.

name: Base Web
description: Base Web is Uber's React component library that provides a robust foundation for scalable web apps. It includes theming, accessibility, and responsive design support. Built with Styletron, Base Web is suited for large applications needing consistency and modularity.

name: Mantine
description: Mantine is a modern React component library with over 100 customizable components, hooks, and dark mode support. It provides out-of-the-box form management, date pickers, modals, notifications, and layout tools. Mantine also supports server-side rendering and works well with Next.js.

name: React Spectrum
description: React Spectrum is Adobe’s design system and component library for React. Built with accessibility, internationalization, and theme support at its core, it powers enterprise-grade applications. It includes data grids, modals, buttons, pickers, and layout utilities.

name: React95
description: React95 is a nostalgic React component library that mimics Windows 95 UI elements. It includes classic components like windows, buttons, text fields, and start menus. Great for retro-themed projects and fun UI experiments with a unique aesthetic.

name: shadcn/ui
description: shadcn/ui is a modern component library that combines Radix primitives with Tailwind CSS for maximum flexibility. It ships with accessible, themeable components like buttons, cards, forms, and tooltips, designed for use in modern React and Next.js applications.

name: Geist
description: Geist is Vercel’s official design system and component library. It provides a set of React components and accompanying styles optimized for clean, consistent, and minimal UI across Vercel products. Geist supports dark mode, typography utilities, and advanced theming.

name: React Admin
description: React Admin is a frontend framework for building admin panels on top of REST and GraphQL APIs. It includes authentication, theming, filtering, pagination, and form generation. It’s widely used in enterprise applications and is customizable with Material UI.

name: AdminJS
description: AdminJS is a full-stack admin panel for managing application data, built with Node.js and React. It supports multiple ORMs and databases, custom themes, role-based access control, and Express integration. Ideal for building custom dashboards and back-office tools.

name: Tabler
description: Tabler is a free and open-source dashboard UI kit with over 100 components built on Bootstrap. It offers pre-built layouts, responsive charts, modals, and form elements, designed for fast development of modern admin interfaces.

name: CoreUI
description: CoreUI is an open-source Bootstrap admin template with Vue, React, and Angular versions. It provides widgets, charts, icons, and customizable layouts for building responsive dashboards and management interfaces quickly.

name: Vuestic UI
description: Vuestic UI is a feature-rich Vue 3 component library designed for dashboards and admin interfaces. It includes ready-to-use charts, tables, and form controls with full theming and responsive support. Ideal for Vue-based enterprise applications.

name: Vue Material Admin
description: Vue Material Admin is a clean and minimal dashboard template based on Vue.js and Vuetify. It comes with charts, authentication pages, and responsive layouts. It’s ideal for projects that require Material Design aesthetics and Vue integration.

name: Volt React Dashboard
description: Volt React Dashboard is a free and open-source admin dashboard template built with React and Bootstrap 5. It features chart components, user profile pages, tables, and modals. Great for quick dashboard development using familiar Bootstrap elements.

name: React Bootstrap Admin Template
description: A responsive React admin template based on Bootstrap 4 and Reactstrap. It includes pre-built components like tables, cards, forms, and profile pages with flexible layout options. Good for rapid prototyping and business management tools.

name: Light Bootstrap Dashboard React
description: Light Bootstrap Dashboard React is a sleek and lightweight admin dashboard template based on React and Bootstrap. It includes table components, modals, charts, and multiple layout pages. Suitable for clean and modern web app backends.

name: Datta Able React
description: Datta Able is a clean and elegant React admin dashboard built on Bootstrap 4. It includes over 150 UI components, pre-designed pages, and charts for managing dashboards, analytics, and back-office tools. Ideal for scalable and customizable enterprise dashboards.

name: Notus React
description: Notus React is a free Tailwind CSS and React UI Kit and admin template developed by Creative Tim. It comes with prebuilt examples, login/register pages, UI components, and charts designed for mobile-first dashboards and landing pages.

name: Argon Dashboard React
description: Argon Dashboard React is a beautifully designed admin panel template using Bootstrap 4 and React. It offers reusable components, custom plugins, and example pages for user management, tables, charts, and authentication flows.

name: Vue Black Dashboard
description: Vue Black Dashboard is a beautiful, dark-themed admin panel template made with Vue.js and Bootstrap. It features charts, maps, tables, and user profile components. It's perfect for applications requiring a sleek, modern admin interface.

name: Windmill Dashboard
description: Windmill Dashboard is a multi-theme, fully responsive admin template built with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. It includes dashboard UI blocks, chart components, and layout scaffolding, making it suitable for SaaS admin panels and data-heavy applications.

name: Berry Dashboard React
description: Berry is a free admin dashboard template built using React and MUI (Material-UI). It comes with ready-to-use authentication flows, customizable sidebar layouts, and dashboard widgets for managing users and reports in enterprise systems.

name: Material Kit React
description: Material Kit React is a free UI kit built with Material-UI and React. It includes buttons, inputs, navbars, tabs, and cards with modern design and consistent theming. Useful for dashboards, portfolios, and small business websites.

name: Tailwind Admin Template
description: Tailwind Admin Template is a minimalist dashboard layout built using Tailwind CSS. It offers authentication pages, tables, charts, and reusable components for rapid admin panel development with zero JavaScript dependencies.

name: Notus Vue
description: Notus Vue is a Vue.js admin dashboard and UI kit using Tailwind CSS. It provides cards, buttons, modals, input fields, and dark/light themes. Ideal for projects using Vue and Tailwind with clean design expectations.

name: Vue Material Dashboard
description: Vue Material Dashboard is a Vue.js admin panel based on the Material Design system. It includes Google Maps integration, notifications, responsive tables, and charts. Built on Vue 2 and Vue Router, it’s ideal for simple business dashboards.

name: Nuxt Dashboard
description: Nuxt Dashboard is a clean and simple dashboard starter built with Nuxt.js and Tailwind CSS. It includes preconfigured layouts, dark mode support, and component examples for charts, navigation, and forms. Ideal for creating fast, modern Vue-based admin UIs.

name: Vue Tailwind Dashboard
description: Vue Tailwind Dashboard is a responsive and customizable admin panel starter built using Vue 3 and Tailwind CSS. It provides layout presets, charts, and data tables, and is perfect for lightweight internal tools and SaaS dashboards.

name: TailAdmin
description: TailAdmin is a modern Tailwind CSS admin dashboard template featuring charts, forms, tables, and authentication pages. It is highly customizable and includes both free and premium versions for building modern backend tools and analytics portals.

name: Vue Argon Dashboard
description: Vue Argon Dashboard is a beautiful Vue.js admin panel template based on Bootstrap 4 and Argon Design System. It includes fully coded pages, reusable components, charts, and plugins, making it perfect for quick Vue-based project setups.

name: Voler
description: Voler is a simple and lightweight Bootstrap 5 admin dashboard template. It provides basic layout structure, prebuilt widgets, and essential components like tables, modals, and sidebars, suited for basic internal tools and small admin panels.

name: Nice Admin Lite
description: Nice Admin Lite is a basic version of the Nice Admin dashboard template based on Bootstrap 5. It includes chart libraries, responsive widgets, and a starter UI for developing basic analytics dashboards and control panels.

name: Matrix Admin
description: Matrix Admin is a feature-rich dashboard template built on Bootstrap 5. It includes multiple layout versions, UI elements, icons, tables, and forms. Used for developing internal systems, analytics dashboards, and SaaS admin panels.

name: Soft UI Dashboard React
description: Soft UI Dashboard React is a sleek, modern dashboard template built on React and Material UI. It includes charts, forms, calendars, notifications, and ready-to-use user management pages, designed for SaaS and admin platforms.

name: Sneat Vue Dashboard
description: Sneat is a modern Vue 3 admin dashboard template with clean design, light/dark themes, and UI components. It includes form validation, charts, and authentication support. Ideal for data-heavy enterprise applications and admin tools.

name: Material Dashboard React
description: Material Dashboard React is a free React admin panel template based on Material UI. It features Google Maps integration, vector charts, tables, forms, and profile pages. Well-suited for management dashboards, CRM tools, and SaaS apps.

name: Atlantis Lite React
description: Atlantis Lite React is a lightweight and free React admin template featuring charts, tables, and forms. It offers basic UI blocks and layout examples suited for internal tools, CMS dashboards, and backend portals.

name: Argon Dashboard Bootstrap
description: Argon Dashboard Bootstrap is a responsive Bootstrap 4 admin panel with ready-made cards, user flows, authentication pages, and form validation. Useful for full-stack apps requiring sleek dashboard UIs.

name: Focus Bootstrap Admin
description: Focus Bootstrap Admin is a flat admin dashboard template using Bootstrap 4. It includes charts, widgets, and email inbox templates and is best used for building back-office and CRM tools.

name: Skote React
description: Skote React is a premium admin dashboard template built using React and Redux. It includes ecommerce layouts, Kanban boards, calendar views, chat modules, and dark mode. Ideal for SaaS applications and backend systems.

name: Vuexy React
description: Vuexy React is a developer-friendly and customizable React admin template. It includes Laravel integration, JWT auth, charts, email modules, and eCommerce dashboards. Perfect for enterprise and cross-platfor apps.

name: Dashkit
description: Dashkit is a flexible and clean dashboard UI template for developers. Built on Bootstrap 4, it supports charts, tables, notifications, and form validations. Useful for analytics and internal project dashboards.

name: Metronic
description: Metronic is one of the most popular admin dashboard themes with versions in React, Angular, Vue, and HTML. It includes layout generators, RTL support, ecommerce features, and enterprise-ready integrations.

name: Material Dashboard Angular
description: Material Dashboard Angular is a fully responsive admin dashboard template built with Angular and Google’s Material Design. It includes over 60 components, customizable pages, and charts for building robust web apps.

name: Ng-Dash
description: Ng-Dash is an Angular admin dashboard with responsive UI, prebuilt modules, and clean architecture. It includes collapsible sidebars, UI widgets, and Angular forms integration — ideal for mid-scale admin panels.

name: ngx-admin
description: ngx-admin is a full-featured Angular dashboard template with support for Bootstrap and Nebular. It features auth modules, role-based access, smart tables, and responsive layout options. Best suited for admin systems, CMSs, and enterprise tools.

name: Vue Final Modal
description: Vue Final Modal is a powerful, flexible modal component for Vue 3 and 2. It supports SSR, teleport, multiple instances, transitions, and dynamic modals with asynchronous logic. Useful for custom dialog flows, confirmation boxes, and form modals in Vue apps.

name: Vue.js Toggle Button
description: Vue.js Toggle Button is a simple, customizable toggle switch component for Vue.js. It supports both v-model binding and custom styles, making it useful for forms, preference panels, and settings toggles in Vue applications.

name: Vue Loading Overlay
description: Vue Loading Overlay provides animated loading indicators that can be used globally or inside components. It supports custom messages, color themes, and full-screen overlays. Ideal for AJAX loading, form submission feedback, and async content.

name: Vue Tabs Component
description: Vue Tabs Component is a simple and highly customizable tab container for Vue. It supports nested tabs, slots, and dynamic content loading, making it suitable for dashboards, profile sections, and admin panels.

name: Vue Color
description: Vue Color is a collection of color pickers from Sketch, Photoshop, Chrome, and others implemented for Vue.js. It supports alpha sliders, saturation inputs, and customizable palettes, useful for design tools and theme configurators.

name: Vue Toast Notification
description: Vue Toast Notification provides lightweight, animated toast messages for Vue apps. It supports positioning, themes, icons, and auto-dismiss functionality, and is ideal for alerts, feedback messages, and system notifications.

name: Vue JSON Pretty
description: Vue JSON Pretty is a Vue component for displaying JSON data in a readable, colorful, and collapsible format. It’s useful for debugging, API explorers, developer tools, and config editors in Vue applications.

name: Vue Context
description: Vue Context is a simple yet customizable right-click context menu component for Vue. It supports nested menus, icons, and programmatic control. Useful for file managers, dashboards, and interactive UIs.

name: Vue Slider Component
description: Vue Slider Component is a highly customizable slider control for Vue.js. It supports range selection, tooltips, vertical mode, and custom styling. It's great for filters, settings panels, and input ranges in modern UIs.

name: Vue Good Table
description: Vue Good Table is a powerful and flexible table component for Vue with support for sorting, filtering, pagination, and inline editing. It's ideal for data-heavy apps, admin dashboards, and content management systems.

name: Vue Good Table Next
description: Vue Good Table Next is the Vue 3-compatible version of the original Vue Good Table. It offers powerful data table features like sorting, searching, filtering, pagination, and expandable rows with high performance and minimal setup.

name: Vue Advanced Cropper
description: Vue Advanced Cropper is a robust image cropping tool for Vue.js. It supports custom aspect ratios, zooming, rotation, canvas-based transformations, and overlays. Ideal for image upload workflows in dashboards and CMSs.

name: Vue Sweetalert2
description: Vue Sweetalert2 is a wrapper for the popular SweetAlert2 library that brings beautiful and customizable alert boxes to Vue applications. It supports modals, confirmations, input prompts, and auto-dismissed notifications.

name: Vue ScrollTo
description: Vue ScrollTo is a lightweight, dependency-free plugin for smooth scrolling in Vue.js apps. It enables animated navigation between elements with options for easing, offset, and duration. Useful for single-page apps and landing pages.

name: Vue Page Transition
description: Vue Page Transition provides animated transitions between routes or components in Vue apps. It supports various CSS and JavaScript-based effects like fades, slides, and zooms. Ideal for SPAs looking for smooth UX transitions.

name: Vue Virtual Scroller
description: Vue Virtual Scroller is a high-performance scrolling component for large lists. It renders only the visible items, reducing DOM load and improving performance. Ideal for tables, feeds, and data grids with thousands of rows.

name: Vue2 Datepicker
description: Vue2 Datepicker is a customizable and lightweight date and time picker for Vue.js 2. It supports localization, range selection, inline display, and shortcuts. Great for form UIs requiring flexible date input handling.

name: Vue Tooltip
description: Vue Tooltip is a Vue directive and component for creating lightweight, customizable tooltips. It supports HTML content, themes, placement control, and delay settings. Ideal for adding contextual help or hints to UI elements.

name: Vue The Mask
description: Vue The Mask provides input masking functionality for Vue 2 and 3 applications. It allows formatting of user inputs like phone numbers, dates, or currency with minimal setup and v-mask directive support.

name: Vue Content Loader
description: Vue Content Loader allows developers to create customizable SVG skeleton screens to improve loading UX. It replicates the layout of content while it loads, with animation and theming support. Inspired by Facebook’s content placeholder design.

name: Vue Autosuggest
description: Vue Autosuggest is a flexible autocomplete component for Vue.js. It supports asynchronous data sources, keyboard navigation, custom rendering, and multiple suggestion sections. Ideal for search bars, form inputs, and command palettes.

name: Vue Infinite Loading
description: Vue Infinite Loading is an infinite scroll component for Vue 2 that detects when a user has scrolled to the bottom of a container and triggers a callback. Supports loading indicators, error retry, and customizable messages.

name: Vue Drag Resize
description: Vue Drag Resize is a Vue component that allows elements to be dragged, resized, and rotated within a container. It supports snapping, aspect ratio locking, and handles customization. Useful for design apps and editors.

name: Vue Multiselect
description: Vue Multiselect is a powerful select/dropdown component for Vue.js. It supports single and multiple selection, tagging, filtering, search, and asynchronous options. Ideal for form-heavy applications and complex filter UIs.

name: Vue Tags Input
description: Vue Tags Input is a Vue component for managing user-generated tags. It supports custom validation, autocomplete suggestions, deletions, and max limits. Often used in tagging systems, CMSs, and filter builders.

name: Vue Select
description: Vue Select is a feature-rich select box component with support for single/multi-select, search, tagging, and custom options. It is accessible, keyboard-navigable, and widely used in both small forms and enterprise dashboards.

name: Vue Quill Editor
description: Vue Quill Editor is a rich text editor component for Vue based on the Quill.js core. It supports custom toolbars, themes, syntax highlighting, and events. Ideal for blogs, CMSs, and form-based rich content editors.

name: Vue Editor.js
description: Vue Editor.js is a wrapper for the Editor.js block-style content editor in Vue.js. It supports blocks for headers, images, lists, embeds, and more. Perfect for creating structured content editing UIs inside Vue applications.

name: Vue WYSIWYG
description: Vue WYSIWYG is a lightweight what-you-see-is-what-you-get rich text editor built for Vue.js. It provides simple toolbars for formatting, links, and images, suitable for comment boxes, blogs, and user-generated content.

name: Vue Image Lightbox
description: Vue Image Lightbox is a responsive and touch-friendly lightbox component for displaying images in full screen. It supports image groups, navigation arrows, keyboard control, and swipe gestures for mobile.

name: Vue-js-modal
description: Vue-js-modal is a lightweight and customizable modal library for Vue.js. It supports dynamic content, nested modals, transitions, and advanced configuration options. Ideal for dialog boxes, confirmation prompts, and modal-based workflows in Vue apps.

name: Vue Slick Carousel
description: Vue Slick Carousel is a Vue wrapper for the popular Slick carousel. It supports autoplay, responsive design, infinite looping, and navigation controls. Great for image sliders, featured products, and testimonials.

name: Vue Carousel 3D
description: Vue Carousel 3D is a Vue component for creating 3D carousel effects with customizable depth, tilt, and navigation. It's suitable for product showcases, galleries, and modern visual presentations.

name: Vue Carousel
description: Vue Carousel is a flexible, responsive carousel component for Vue.js. It supports touch swiping, slide indicators, autoplay, and responsive breakpoints. Often used for marketing sliders, banners, and product highlights.

name: Vue Awesome Swiper
description: Vue Awesome Swiper integrates the SwiperJS library with Vue.js, providing powerful touch sliders with parallax, lazy loading, and responsive options. Perfect for mobile-friendly carousels and full-page sliders.

name: Vue Splide
description: Vue Splide is a Vue integration for the lightweight SplideJS slider. It supports vertical and horizontal modes, lazy loading, autoplay, and multiple carousels on the same page. It’s ideal for modern, mobile-first image sliders.

name: Vue Photo Preview
description: Vue Photo Preview provides a responsive lightbox-style image viewer with zoom, swipe, and fullscreen support. It is ideal for mobile devices, portfolios, and photo galleries requiring intuitive UX.

name: Vue Image Compare
description: Vue Image Compare is a Vue component for side-by-side image comparison sliders. It supports vertical and horizontal layouts, custom handles, and responsive design. Useful for before-after UI, photo comparisons, and product demos.

name: Vue Cool Lightbox
description: Vue Cool Lightbox is a flexible image lightbox plugin for Vue.js. It supports gallery navigation, keyboard shortcuts, zoom, and fullscreen display. It works well for eCommerce product previews and gallery UIs.

name: Vue Lightbox
description: Vue Lightbox is a minimal and lightweight lightbox component for Vue applications. It supports keyboard and touch navigation, dynamic image lists, and custom styling, making it perfect for quick gallery features.

name: Vue Draggable Resizable
description: Vue Draggable Resizable is a Vue component that enables drag-and-resize functionality on elements. It supports snap-to-grid, aspect ratio locking, custom handles, and bounding. Ideal for editors, dashboards, and interactive layouts.

name: Vue PDF
description: Vue PDF is a Vue.js component for rendering PDF documents using PDF.js. It supports zoom, pagination, and dynamic source binding, making it useful for previews, document viewers, and embedded content tools.

name: Vue Signature Pad
description: Vue Signature Pad is a wrapper around signature_pad for capturing user-drawn signatures in Vue apps. It allows resizing, exporting, clearing, and real-time data capture — perfect for forms, contracts, and e-signatures.

name: Vue Chart.js
description: Vue Chart.js is a Vue wrapper for Chart.js, offering declarative charts with two-way data binding and reactive updates. It supports bar, line, pie, radar, and more chart types, ideal for dashboards and data visualization tools.

name: Vue ECharts
description: Vue ECharts is a Vue 3 and Vue 2 wrapper for Apache ECharts, enabling high-performance, interactive charts. It supports custom themes, real-time updates, and responsive charts — perfect for analytics dashboards.

name: Vue Google Charts
description: Vue Google Charts is a Vue component for Google Charts integration. It supports all major chart types and customization features including tooltips, themes, and dynamic updates. Useful for business dashboards and reports.

name: Vue D3 Network
description: Vue D3 Network is a Vue.js component for visualizing network graphs using D3.js. It supports interactivity, zooming, dragging, and directional arrows, making it suitable for data relationships, dependency graphs, and tree structures.

name: Vue Grid Layout
description: Vue Grid Layout is a responsive draggable and resizable grid system for Vue.js, inspired by React-Grid-Layout. It supports drag-and-drop positioning and layout saving — great for dashboards and widget-based UIs.

name: Vue Split Pane
description: Vue Split Pane is a simple, draggable split-pane layout component. It supports vertical and horizontal splitting, min/max sizes, and real-time resizing. Great for IDE-like interfaces, dashboards, and multi-panel apps.

name: Vue Smooth DnD
description: Vue Smooth DnD is a wrapper for the Smooth-DnD library, offering beautiful drag-and-drop with nesting, animation, and touch support. It’s ideal for Kanban boards, card UIs, and reordering lists in Vue apps.

name: Vue Form Generator
description: Vue Form Generator is a schema-based form generation library for Vue.js. It allows developers to define form fields using JSON schemas and supports validations, custom inputs, and conditional rendering. Ideal for admin dashboards and dynamic input interfaces.

name: Vue JSON Schema Form
description: Vue JSON Schema Form is a Vue.js component that generates forms from JSON Schema definitions. It supports custom widgets, conditional fields, form validation, and nested structures. Useful for form-heavy applications and automation tools.

name: Vue Formulate
description: Vue Formulate is a powerful form framework for Vue that abstracts away input types, validations, and form states. It provides a single syntax for forms, supports custom validation rules, and integrates easily with Vue CLI and SSR.

name: Vue Final Form
description: Vue Final Form is a lightweight form state management library inspired by Final Form. It provides a reactive API to manage field-level validation, submission handling, and form state without bloat. Ideal for highly controlled forms.

name: VeeValidate
description: VeeValidate is one of the most popular Vue form validation libraries. It supports both template-driven and schema-based validation, custom rules, localization, and TypeScript. Perfect for production-ready, multilingual Vue apps.

name: Vuelidate
description: Vuelidate is a lightweight model-based validation library for Vue. It enables reactive validations and supports custom validators, nested rules, and async checks. It’s designed to be logic-driven rather than markup-heavy.

name: Vue Use Form
description: Vue Use Form is a composition API-based form handler for Vue 3. It provides form state, error handling, validation, and controlled/uncontrolled input support. Built to be small, performant, and suitable for modern Vue projects.

name: Vue Form Wizard
description: Vue Form Wizard helps build multi-step form wizards using Vue.js. It supports validation per step, navigation controls, progress indicators, and custom layouts. Ideal for onboarding flows, multi-step registrations, and surveys.

name: Vue Stepper Component
description: Vue Stepper Component is a UI component that enables step-by-step forms and workflows. It includes vertical/horizontal layouts, customizable icons, and validation between steps. Commonly used in checkout pages and wizards.

name: Vue Easy Form Builder
description: Vue Easy Form Builder is a drag-and-drop form designer and runtime builder. It supports exporting schema, field mapping, conditional logic, and real-time preview. Designed for admin tools and no-code platforms.

name: Vue Formly
description: Vue Formly is a dynamic form rendering library inspired by Angular Formly. It enables the creation of forms based on JSON configuration with built-in support for custom components and validation. Ideal for low-code and admin solutions.

name: Vue JSON Editor
description: Vue JSON Editor is a wrapper around the popular JSONEditor library. It provides a rich text and tree-based editor for JSON data with validation, schema support, and drag-and-drop nodes. Great for dashboards, API tools, and data config panels.

name: Vue Clipboard2
description: Vue Clipboard2 is a Vue.js plugin that makes copying text to clipboard seamless. It’s based on clipboard.js and provides directives to quickly implement copy-to-clipboard functionality in any component.

name: Vue Stripe Checkout
description: Vue Stripe Checkout is a Vue.js integration of Stripe’s Checkout API. It enables seamless payment workflows with support for single and subscription-based payments. Perfect for e-commerce, donations, and SaaS platforms.

name: Vue Country Flag
description: Vue Country Flag is a component to display ISO 3166-1 country flags using emoji or SVG styles. It supports over 250 flags and can be used for language switchers, form selectors, and internationalized interfaces.

name: Vue World Map
description: Vue World Map is a simple and responsive world map component built with SVG. It allows interactivity, click events, country highlighting, and custom tooltip content — great for dashboards and global data visualizations.

name: Vue Prism Editor
description: Vue Prism Editor is a lightweight, extensible code editor component for Vue.js that uses PrismJS for syntax highlighting. It supports theme customization, line numbering, and is ideal for embedding editors in web IDEs or documentation tools.

name: Vue Monaco Editor
description: Vue Monaco Editor is a Vue component for integrating Microsoft’s Monaco Editor, the same editor that powers VS Code. It supports TypeScript, JSON, CSS, HTML, and more — ideal for developer-focused applications.

name: Vue Simple Markdown
description: Vue Simple Markdown is a markdown rendering plugin using Markdown-it. It supports inline HTML, syntax highlighting, and emoji parsing. Great for blogs, documentation, and note-taking interfaces in Vue apps.

name: Vue Markdown Editor
description: Vue Markdown Editor is a full-featured markdown editor built with Vue and CodeMirror. It supports live preview, toolbar actions, theme customization, and file saving — excellent for docs, wikis, and user-generated content.

name: Vue MathJax
description: Vue MathJax is a lightweight wrapper for MathJax that enables LaTeX and math expression rendering in Vue.js applications. It supports inline and block formulas, making it perfect for educational tools, scientific writing, and STEM dashboards.

name: Vue LaTeX
description: Vue LaTeX is a Vue.js plugin for rendering LaTeX using KaTeX. It provides fast, server-independent math typesetting and supports both block and inline rendering. Great for learning platforms, math tools, and scientific interfaces.

name: Vue Video Player
description: Vue Video Player is a video player component based on Video.js for Vue.js. It supports HTML5 video, HLS, and custom controls, making it ideal for media platforms, video tutorials, and e-learning sites.

name: Vue Audio
description: Vue Audio is a lightweight wrapper for HTML5 audio players in Vue.js. It supports autoplay, loop, volume control, and playlist management. Ideal for podcast apps, learning tools, and audio-driven UIs.

name: Vue Sound Player
description: Vue Sound Player is a simple and extensible component for embedding sound playback into Vue applications. It supports waveform visualization and click-to-play mechanics. Useful for music platforms and creative UIs.

name: Vue Web Audio
description: Vue Web Audio is a Vue.js interface for the Web Audio API. It allows creating real-time audio visualizations and manipulating audio nodes. Best used for equalizers, mixers, and browser-based music editors.

name: Vue Player
description: Vue Player is a Vue wrapper for Plyr, an accessible and customizable HTML5 media player. It supports video, audio, YouTube, and Vimeo integrations. Used in educational platforms and media dashboards.

name: Vue Lazyload
description: Vue Lazyload is a lightweight plugin to lazy-load images in Vue apps. It includes scroll detection, placeholder support, loading indicators, and error fallback images. Ideal for performance optimization on content-heavy sites.

name: Vue Content Placeholders
description: Vue Content Placeholders is a plugin for creating skeleton loading screens. Inspired by Facebook's loading UX, it offers animated placeholder blocks for improving perceived performance while data loads.

name: Vue Lazy Hydration
description: Vue Lazy Hydration allows you to delay hydration of Vue components until they become visible or interactable. It’s especially useful in SSR (Nuxt.js) applications to improve performance and reduce initial load time.

name: Vue Infinite Scroll
description: Vue Infinite Scroll is a lightweight directive for implementing infinite scroll loading in Vue apps. It attaches scroll event handlers to containers and triggers data loading as the user reaches the end. Great for social feeds and long lists.

name: Vue Scrollactive
description: Vue Scrollactive adds smooth scroll and active link highlighting to navigation menus. It’s ideal for single-page applications, landing pages, or documentation that requires dynamic menu indicators tied to scroll position.

name: Vue Page Scroll Progress
description: Vue Page Scroll Progress adds a customizable scroll progress bar to the top of your app. It reacts to scroll depth and can be styled for use cases like blog reading progress, tutorials, or long content UX.

name: Vue Slide Up Down
description: Vue Slide Up Down is a lightweight component for smoothly expanding or collapsing content sections using transition height auto. Great for accordions, FAQs, and hidden menus with minimal CSS.

name: Vue Transition Expand
description: Vue Transition Expand is a simple Vue directive and component that allows vertical expansion of containers with animated transitions. It’s commonly used for mobile navs, dropdowns, and collapsible sections.

name: Vue Smooth Scrollbar
description: Vue Smooth Scrollbar integrates Smooth Scrollbar.js into Vue for customizable, inertia-based scrollbars. It supports horizontal and vertical scrolling, theming, and API methods for scroll behavior — perfect for modern SPAs.

name: Vue Observe Visibility
description: Vue Observe Visibility is a directive that allows Vue components to detect when they become visible in the viewport. Built on Intersection Observer API, it’s perfect for lazy loading, analytics, and animations on scroll.

name: Vue Scroll Reveal
description: Vue Scroll Reveal integrates ScrollReveal animations into Vue. It adds scroll-based animation directives for fades, slides, and other effects. Great for attention-grabbing landing pages and portfolios.

name: Vue Observe Element
description: Vue Observe Element allows components to react to changes in size or position using ResizeObserver and MutationObserver. Ideal for responsive layout tuning and performance optimization in reactive layouts.

name: Vue ScrollMagic
description: Vue ScrollMagic integrates the ScrollMagic animation controller into Vue. It allows scroll-based animations and pinning of elements tied to scroll position. Great for storytelling, infographics, and scroll-triggered content.

name: Vue BackToTop
description: Vue BackToTop is a simple Vue component that adds a scroll-to-top button with customizable styling and behavior. It appears after scrolling down a certain distance and is useful in long-form content or infinite scroll interfaces.

name: Vue Headroom
description: Vue Headroom is a wrapper for Headroom.js that enables smart header visibility control based on scroll behavior. It hides or reveals navigation bars as users scroll, improving the mobile and desktop navigation experience.

name: Vue Sticky Directive
description: Vue Sticky Directive enables sticky positioning of elements with polyfill fallback support. It’s used for headers, toolbars, or sidebars that remain fixed as the user scrolls past a certain point.

name: Vue Sticky
description: Vue Sticky is a minimal sticky container plugin for Vue. It uses native position: sticky behavior with fallbacks, and allows for sticky headers, sections, or banners across all modern browsers.

name: Vue Affix
description: Vue Affix is a component that affixes elements to the top or bottom of the viewport on scroll. Inspired by Bootstrap’s affix component, it is used for sticky navigation bars, ads, or side elements.

name: Vue Responsive
description: Vue Responsive is a responsive utility plugin that allows developers to conditionally render or modify behavior based on viewport size. It works well with SSR and Nuxt, helping build mobile-first layouts.

name: Vue Screen Size
description: Vue Screen Size is a reactive screen size detection plugin. It provides Vue components with breakpoints and helper functions for conditionally displaying content based on screen width or orientation.

name: Vue MQ
description: Vue MQ is a media query plugin for Vue.js. It allows developers to define custom breakpoints and respond to them in templates or computed logic. Great for building adaptive, responsive Vue interfaces.

name: Vue Responsive Components
description: Vue Responsive Components is a collection of components that automatically resize or swap content based on the container or screen. It helps manage adaptive design patterns like image swaps or layout toggling.

name: Vue Element Resize Detector
description: Vue Element Resize Detector is a plugin for detecting DOM element size changes. It uses ResizeObserver under the hood and emits reactive size updates — essential for dynamic UIs and interactive layouts.
